description: Black Burn is the original Thunder King and a Gravity Child whose Regalia uses artificial lightning as a destructive force as well as a wire system similar to Nue`s. His Thunder Regalia is the original, full-body Regalia. The degraded version of this regalia is in possession of Nue. When Sora tried to defeat Kilik, he chose sides with Sora, along with Dontores, Falko, and Spitfire. Upon losing this fight Black Burn lost his riding ability, and his regalia.
name: Black Burn
